channel.title: Moparisthebest Battlefield 2 Clan
channel.description:
[b]Name[/b] We're going to need a clan name, "Moparisthebest Battlefield 2 Clan" just isn't going to cut it. If anyone has any suggestions, post them.
[b]Leaders[/b] io9 and daviddude36, as they had the idea in the first place.
[b]Software[/b] This is a PC clan, however if enough people have the xbox version, it could be incorporated as well. If enough people have a certain booster/addon pack, maps specific to those addons could be played. I have Battlefield 2:Special Forces myself.
[b]Servers[/b] I have an old dedicated Linux box, so I'll look into setting up a server on it, but chances are it will be too slow. If we can't get a server of our own, there are usually other people's servers with less than 10 players on it, I'm sure they wouldn't mind a few more players.
[b]Times[/b] We will have to organize a common time when we can get online and play a few maps. This might be difficult due to some large geographical, and therefor time zone differences.
[b]Members[/b] If you'd like to join, post with the following format:
[b]BF2 Username: [/b] J0nny000 [b]BF2 Addons: [/b] Special Forces [b]Time zone: [/b] Eastern Standard Time (GMT -5:00).
[code] [b]BF2 Username: [/b] [b]BF2 Addons: [/b] [b]Time zone: [/b] [/code]
If anyone actually joins, I could throw up a web page with the times and servers we'll be playing on.
Thanks, feel free to post any suggestions, or flame me for making such a retarded thread.

item.title: Moparisthebest Battlefield 2 Clan
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Hola everybody. I was kinda thinking, MITB wouldn’t probably run a BF2 server on his dedi (plus that would suck since most of the server resources go on the forums), perhaps we could create our own separate clan that is MITB members only. I have a friend who can host a BF2 server on his dedi, and I could host the clan forums, etc. So, perhaps we should stick to that.

Also,
BF2 Username: mybilya (I had my score reset a bit ago)
BF2 Addons: Complete Collection (but only vanilla BF2 works)
Time zone: Eastern Standard Time: GMT -05:00 (I’m usually on from 3 to 5)

Read full topic

item.title: Moparisthebest Battlefield 2 Clan
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Name
We’re going to need a clan name, “Moparisthebest Battlefield 2 Clan” just isn’t going to cut it. If anyone has any suggestions, post them.

Leaders
io9 and daviddude36, as they had the idea in the first place.

Software
This is a PC clan, however if enough people have the xbox version, it could be incorporated as well. If enough people have a certain booster/addon pack, maps specific to those addons could be played. I have Battlefield 2:Special Forces myself.

Servers
I have an old dedicated Linux box, so I’ll look into setting up a server on it, but chances are it will be too slow. If we can’t get a server of our own, there are usually other people’s servers with less than 10 players on it, I’m sure they wouldn’t mind a few more players.

Times
We will have to organize a common time when we can get online and play a few maps. This might be difficult due to some large geographical, and therefor time zone differences.

Members
If you’d like to join, post with the following format:

BF2 Username: J0nny000
BF2 Addons: Special Forces
Time zone: Eastern Standard Time (GMT -5:00).

[b]BF2 Username: [/b]
[b]BF2 Addons: [/b]
[b]Time zone: [/b]

If anyone actually joins, I could throw up a web page with the times and servers we’ll be playing on.

Thanks, feel free to post any suggestions, or flame me for making such a retarded thread.
